programme.title: Oravametsa lood
programme.desc: Neljapäevi oodatakse oravametsas suure ärevusega, oravad valmistuvad selleks suurima hoolega, sest see on ju peitusepäev.(n)

programme.title: Ellujäämisheitlus
programme.desc: Okavango jõgi Lõuna-Aafrikas Botswanas on niiluse krokodilli üks asualasid. Angola mägismaalt pärinev vihmavesi põhjustab mitu kuud üleujutusi ja äratab Kalahari kõrbe ellu. Sel ajal võib jõgi olla 20 kilomeetri laiune. Krokodille kartvad kohalikud tapavad väikesi loomi, enne kui nad ohtlikuks muutuvad. Krokodillide vähesus põhjustab aga sägade liigset paljunemist, kes söövad ära kõik kalad. Rahvusvaheline meeskond filmis krokodillide veealuseid elupaiku.(n)

programme.title: Ületamatu loomariik
programme.desc: Inimene pole ainus liik, kes on sündinud ehitama, ja looduse arhitektid valdavad saladusi, mille lahtimuukimiseni on veel pikk tee. Koprad rajavad endale võimsaid elamuid, termiidid losse, mis püsivad sajandeid, ämblikud on tõelised kunstimeistrid... Kui enamik loomi lepib oma karmi keskkonnaga, siis osa neist otsustab ise, milline üks õige kodu peab olema.(n)

programme.title: PÖFFi kaheksa ja pool
programme.desc: Pimedate ööde filmifestivali säravaimad hetked ja põnevaimad uudised vallutavad ekraani.(n)

programme.title: Saladuslik Aafrika
programme.desc: Serengeti Rahvuspargis satume tõelise jõehobude supi sisse. Uue teemana on aga päevakorda kerkinud tsetsekärbes, kelle hammustusega levib unitõbi, mis on paljude loomade ja inimese jaoks surmav. Neid kärbseid on siin enam kui küllaga, aga loodusvaated lummavad ja nii ununeb see tüütu putukas peagi. Aafrikas seiklesid Peeter Vähi ja Tiina Jokinen.(n)

programme.title: Babülon-Berliin
programme.desc: Rathil ja Zörgiebelil pole tõendeid, et Benda mõrvareid paljastada. Charlotte teeb fantoomi osas olulise avastuse, mis seab tema elu ohtu.(n)

programme.title: Babülon-Berliin
programme.desc: Politsei on fantoomi isiku välja selgitanud. Litten ja Charlotte püüavad Gretat päästa, iga minut on arvel. Nyssen saab New Yorgist teada, et börsikursid langevad järsult.(n)

programme.title: Auguste Escoffier ehk moodsa gastronoomia sünnilugu
Auguste Escoffier
programme.desc: Gastronoomia ehk peenkokakunst sündis umbes sajandi eest tänu ühele prantslasele. Mitmetes luksushotellides töötanud legendaarne meisterkokk Auguste Escoffier moderniseeris Prantsuse kokakunsti ja muutis selle maailmakuulsaks. Tema elutöö on inspireerinud paljusid geniaalseid kokkasid üle kogu maailma.(n)

programme.title: Üksi läbi metsa
programme.desc: "Üksi läbi metsa" on tõeline ellujäämiskursus. ETV+ ajakirjanik Dmitri Kulikov võtab vastu elu raskeima väljakutse — panna end proovile. Dmitri peab kuue päevaga läbima kümneid kilomeetreid mööda metsi ja rabasid, kaasas vaid minimaalne varustus ning ümberringi vaid metsik loodus. Saatejuht peab teekonnal vältima tsivilisatsiooni ja lisaks ootavad teda katsed, millest ta saab teada alles peatuspunkti jõudes. Ülesande edukal sooritamisel ootab teda auhind. Kas sina saaksid selle väljakutsega hakkama?(n)

programme.title: Hoides usku
programme.desc: Faithil algab kohtuprotsess ja Tom esineb tunnistajana tema kliendi vastu. Uus uurija, kes on otsustanud Gail Reardoni trellide taha saata, jälgib Faithi ja käib vanglas Evanit pinnimas.(n)

programme.title: Nöps ja Mikk
programme.desc: Rannas on vahva karussell ja kõik peale Kalle tahavad sellega sõita. Mikk saab teada, et Kalle muretseb keerutamise pärast ja sõbrad aitavad tal üheskoos hirmust võitu saada. Kui aga karusselli võti pooleks murdub, võib Kalle esimene karussellisõit olemata jäädagi.(n)

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Mis saab siis, kui kuningas ja kuninganna otsustavad üheaegselt teisele üllatuse korraldada?(n)

programme.title: Ei-Ei
programme.desc: Magaiver armastab nalja visata ja trikke teha. See on küll lõbus, aga kui kõik päevad on täis vempe, võib juhtuda, et lõpuks ei tundugi naljad enam naljakad.(n)

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Fred kaotab ehmatuse tagajärjel hääle ja palub sõpradelt abi selle tagasisaamisel.(n)

programme.title: Lehm Liselotte
programme.desc: Liselotte aitab kadunud kassi otsida.(n)

programme.title: Siilipoiss Alfredi salapärased seiklused
programme.desc: Lõrinamets on täis kellegi suuri jalajälgi ja tekib kahtlus, et metsa on tunginud hiiglane. Lõpuks selgub, et tegemist on karuga, kes enne talveunne vajumist metsas ringi tatsas.(n)

programme.title: Lastetuba
programme.desc: Timmule on lastetuppa hoiule toodud saatejuht Owe lemmikkala. Päris akvaariumi sees ja puha. Milline võiks olla elu kalana? Stsenarist-lavastaja Elo Selirand, lastele mängivad Mart Kampus, Oskar Seeman ja Owe Petersell.(n)

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Saara peab oma koolimineku ära otsustama ning härra Melóni ja Fabio lubavad teda igati aidata. Tsentoopias püüavad Mo ja Juko südamekristalle kokku panna, kuid Ööväät võtab aina suurema osa saarest enda valdusesse ning nad peavad kiirustama.(n)

programme.title: NOVA
programme.desc: Kõigele põnevale, mis toimub koolis, trennis ja mida muidu vabal ajal iseenda või sõpradega ette võtta, annab vastused laste oma saade NOVA! Vaata meid esmaspäevast neljapäevani kas kell 16.45 või 18.45. Meie saatejuhtidele ja reporteritele saad oma ideid, soove ja küllakutseid saata e-posti nova@err.ee. Noortemagasini toimetavad Laura Kõrvits ja Lota Viik, režissöörid Kristo Veinberg ja Maarja Pärsim.(n)

programme.title: Ringvaade
programme.desc: "Ringvaade" toob vaatajate ette Eesti elu kirevaimad tegelased ja suurimad seiklused. Saatejuhid Marko Reikop ja Grete Lõbu.(n)

programme.title: Ellujäämisheitlus
programme.desc: Okavango jõgi Lõuna-Aafrikas Botswanas on niiluse krokodilli üks asualasid. Angola mägismaalt pärinev vihmavesi põhjustab mitu kuud üleujutusi ja äratab Kalahari kõrbe ellu. Sel ajal võib jõgi olla 20 kilomeetri laiune. Krokodille kartvad kohalikud tapavad väikesi loomi, enne kui nad ohtlikuks muutuvad. Krokodillide vähesus põhjustab aga sägade liigset paljunemist, kes söövad ära kõik kalad. Rahvusvaheline meeskond filmis krokodillide veealuseid elupaiku.(n)

programme.title: Saladuslik Aafrika
programme.desc: Serengeti Rahvuspargis satume tõelise jõehobude supi sisse. Uue teemana on aga päevakorda kerkinud tsetsekärbes, kelle hammustusega levib unitõbi, mis on paljude loomade ja inimese jaoks surmav. Neid kärbseid on siin enam kui küllaga, aga loodusvaated lummavad ja nii ununeb see tüütu putukas peagi. Aafrikas seiklesid Peeter Vähi ja Tiina Jokinen.(n)

programme.title: Kaltsuneiu
programme.desc: Kuus aastat hiljem on Milliest sirgunud kaunis noor naine, keda Aggie ja Ben paaniliselt maailma eest kaitsevad. Millie saab maakohas tööd lapsehoidjana, ent taas sunnivad probleemid teda koju naasma.(n)

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Eesti kaitseväe ajateenijate väljaõppesse kuulub ka loodustarkuste omandamine ja toimetulek looduses. Sõduri ülesanne on jääda looduses nähtamatuks - milliste nippidega seda saavutada? Talvises metsalaagris omandatud oskused ja looduskogemus viib nii mõnegi noore loodusega sina peale. Milline on tänavune hülgekevad? Küsime seda hülgeuurijatelt Mart ja Ivar Jüssilt. Teeme kaasa hüljeste poegimisaegse seire Innarahul ja Laevarahul. Karvasjalg-kakk on öise eluviisiga väike kakuline, kellel pikkust vaid 25 cm. Päeval peidab ta end tihedasse kuusevõrasse või puuõõnesse. Veebruarist alates võib tuulevaiksel ööl karvasjalg-kaku laulu kuulda mitmete kilomeetrite kauguselt. Autorid Kristo Elias, Sander Loite, Tarmo Mikussaar. Režissöör Keiti Väliste, operaatorid Madis Reimund ja Tarmo Mikussaar, helirežissöör Taisto Uuslail, toimetaja-produtsent Õie Arusoo.(n)

programme.title: Plekktrumm
programme.desc: "Plekktrummi" stuudios süttivad tuled, et jätkata vestlusi inimestega, kes on ennast pühendanud kultuuri kujundamisele ja mõtestamisele. Saatejuht Joonas Hellerma.(n)

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Täna näitavad arstid, kuidas drooniga mägedes elusid päästetakse, laboris toimub aga tõeline pidu ja pillerkaar!(n)

programme.title: Beni ja Holly väike kuningriik
programme.desc: Sõbrad lähevad aardejahile. Aaret valvavad merineitsi ja kuldne merekoletis.(n)

programme.title: Oktonaudid
programme.desc: Oktonaudid jälitavad elukat, kes teeb nende seadmetesse suuri ja veidraid auke. Selgub, et tegemist on lõikurhaiga.(n)

programme.title: Nöps ja Mikk
programme.desc: Nöps küpsetab nii maitsva tordi, et Mikk tahab seda kõigile müüma hakata. Tellimusi tuleb aga nii palju, et kohviku köögis valitseb kohutav segadus ja kõik tordid tulevad välja isemoodi. Nüüd peab Nöps leidma sobiva süsteemi, et kõikide klientide soovid täita.(n)

programme.title: Priit ja Prääks
programme.desc: Mereröövlid lasevad aardekirstust välja Fantoomi, kes vallutab nende laeva ja põgeneb koos varandusega. Nüüd peab Priit mereröövlid päästma ja nendega kampa lööma, enne kui Fantoom kogu raamatu hävitab!(n)

programme.title: Ernest ja Celestine
programme.desc: Ernest ootab vanaema külla ja tahab viia ta restorani, kuhu vanaisa kunagi ammu vanaema esimesele kohtamisele viis. Paraku tuleb nii peenes kohas kanda lipsu ja ilmutada häid kombeid...(n)

programme.title: Džungliässad
programme.desc: Džungliässadelt otsib abi üks õnnetu tuukanipaar, kes on oma muna krokodillisoosse pillanud.(n)

programme.title: Väike printsess
programme.desc: Mis teha, kui sulistamisbassein on tühi, aga vihmapilvi pole kuskil näha? Väike Printsess ja Professor otsustavad minna ise pilvi püüdma.(n)

programme.title: Kroonitud peakesed
programme.desc: Käes on nädalalõpp ja korraga ei toimi koolis ükski loits. Baba-Jagaa ilmub kohale ja pakub oma abi.(n)

programme.title: Mängime arsti
programme.desc: Vahva ja hariv minisari 6-9-aastastele lastele, milles selgitatakse lihtsal ning näitlikul viisil enamlevinud haiguste olemust ja sümptomite avaldumisvorme.(n)

programme.title: Siilipoiss Alfredi salapärased seiklused
programme.desc: Jänes Ricardo otsib "Romeo ja Julia" etenduse jaoks sobivat Julia osatäitjat. Cynthiat süüdistatakse esinemisproovi ärarikkumises, kuid tegelikult on kõige taga pilalind, kes teisi esinejaid järele aimab.(n)

programme.title: Saara ja part
programme.desc: Saara ja Part vaatavad tähti, ent imekombel ilmub öösel välja vikerkaar.(n)

programme.title: Arva ära, kui palju ma sind armastan. Jõuluseiklus
Guess How Much I Love You: The Adventures of Little Nutbrown Hare - Christmas to the Moon and Back
programme.desc: Väike pähkelpruun jänku satub jõulude ajal seiklusesse - ta eksib metsa ära, kuid teeb kõik, et veeta jõulud koos oma lähedastega.(n)

programme.title: Mina ja Miia
programme.desc: Koolivaheaeg on läbi ja Saara peab tagasi kooli minema, kuid enne seda ootab Tsentoopia päästmist. Viks ja Gargoona on sepitsenud kavala plaani. Kas Saaral õnnestub viimasel hetkel Tsentoopia süda kokku saada?(n)

programme.title: Äkki õnnestub
A vdrug polutšitsa
programme.desc: Lustakas lugu nelja sõbra - jutuka Pärdiku, tagasihoidliku Elevandipoja, ekstsentrilise Papagoi ja mõtliku Boa ettevõtmistest koduses džunglis, kus tihtilugu tuleb lahendada naljakaid paradokse, mis on seotud mitmetähenduslike sõnamängudega.(n)

programme.title: Operatsioon Ai
programme.desc: Selles saates näete, kui erakordne on inimkeha! Xand tunneb tänase katse pärast muret, sest ei usu, et labor on ajusiirdamise jaoks õige koht. Ronx sõidab taas kiirabibrigaadis.(n)

programme.title: Ellujäämisheitlus
programme.desc: Partlane valgesilm-vart ehk ruskevart on Lääne- ja Kesk-Euroopas haruldaseks jäänud. Kunagi elas ta Põhja-Saksamaal Steinhude järve ääres, kuid viimastel aastakümnetel on ta piirkonnast kadunud. Käimas on projekt valgesilm-vardi asurkonna taastamiseks Steinhude järve ümbruses. Looduskaitsealal paljundatakse ja kasvatatakse valgesilm-varte, kes hiljem lastakse loodusesse. Eesmärk on luua mõne aastaga selline asurkond, mis suudab ise, ilma inimeste poolse sekkumiseta püsida, et valgesilm-vart võiks kord jälle olla kohalik liik.(n)

programme.title: Berliin. Põgenemise kunst
Berlin, l’art de l’évasion
programme.desc: 2019. aastal möödus 30 aastat Berliini müüri langemisest. See 155 km pikkune rõngas Ida-Saksamaal Berliini ümber oli kõige läbipääsmatum takistus, mille inimene loonud. Siiski õnnestus müüri eksisteerimise ajal 1961-1989, vaatamata pidevale valvele ja surmaohule, üle 5000 inimesel sellest tõkkest läbi murda. Filmis näeme seni avaldamata kaadreid, mille Kanada operaator Patrice Massenet filmis kaks aastat enne müüri langemist ning kuuleme lugusid uskumatust vaprusest, leidlikkusest ja visadusest, mis aitas põgenikel vabadusse pääseda.(n)

programme.title: PÖFFi kaheksa ja pool
programme.desc: Pimedate ööde filmifestivali säravaimad hetked ja põnevaimad uudised vallutavad ekraani.(n)

programme.title: 4x4. Türgi
programme.desc: Sarja üheksandas osas jõuame tagasi Bulgaariasse ja leiame järvest kunagise kiriku varemed. Seejärel praamitame end üle Doonau Rumeeniasse ja suundume avastama vana vangilaagrit, mille väravad meile mingil põhjusel lahti tehakse. Tootja Matkafilm OÜ.(n)

programme.title: Filmiklubi
programme.desc: Sissejuhatuse filmile "Sõjakaotused" teeb AK saatejuht Priit Kuusk.(n)

programme.title: Sõjakaotused
Casualties of War
programme.desc: R: Brian De Palma. O: Michael J. Fox, Sean Penn. Väga erinevate filmižanritega töötava Ameerika režissööri Brian De Palma (1940) Vietnami sõja läbielamisi kujutav draama tõstis ta ühele pulgale selliste meisterlavastajatega nagu Stanley Kubrick („Full Metal Jacket”), Oliver Stone („Rühm”) ja Francis Ford Coppola („Tänapäeva apokalüpsis”). Vietnami džunglis redutav viieliikmeline ameeriklaste sõjarühm ihub tapetud relvavenna pärast vietkongidele kättemaksu ja röövib külakesest noore neiu. Sisuliselt seksiorjaks võetud tüdruku kaitseks julgeb välja astuda vaid kapral Eriksson (Fox), kes muutub seeläbi vägivaldse rühmapealiku (Penn) ja teiste kaaslaste silmis kodumaa reeturiks. Filmi muusika on kirjutanud eelmisel aastal meie seast lahkunud Ennio Morricone („Vihane kaheksa”).(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring
programme.desc: Famed paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren get entangled in the most horrifying case they've come across when they're called in by the family of Roger (Ron Livingston) to investigate a demonic presence in a secluded farm house.

programme.title: BlacKkKlansman
programme.desc: A Colorado African-American police officer, Ron Stallworth, manages to join one of the KKK’s groups, and works his way up to leading it, in his attempt to arrest its members.

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to Wonderland through a mirror, and goes on a quest to save the Mad Hatter’s life, by rescuing his family from their doomed fate – she steals the Chronosphere form Time, to travel back in time, but that would lead Wonderland to parish.(n)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a street boy roaming the big crowded city with his devoted monkey friend, Abu, when he meets princess Jasmine and falls in love with her. When he’s taken to jail, he gets involved in a conspiracy plotted by the Sultan's advisor, Jaafar, with the help of a mysterious lamp that has magical powers.(n)

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
programme.desc: After a harrowing journey through the Misty Mountains, during which Bilbo acquires the One Ring, the beloved hobbit, Gandalf, and the dwarves continue on their quest to confront the dragon Smaug and reclaim their gold.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, Roland Deschain fights with everything he has to prevent his enemy, the Man in Black, from bringing down a structure that preserves reality. With the Man in Black trying to use psychic children to unleash darkness, Roland takes one of them in to save both him and the world.(n)

programme.title: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft's father goes missing after he sets off to find the ancient dagger of Xian. She goes looking for him on an exotic Chinese island. Croft assigns her father’ old friend, Lu Ren as her guide on the island, but they have to deal with the consequences of their disastrous journey and find themselves trying to survive.(n)

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: Finn and his ex-wife Tess embark on a treasure hunt that rekindles the flames of their love.(n)

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.(n)

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A runaway train carrying toxic chemicals must be stopped before it derails and kills everyone in town. Its up to a train conductor and engineer (Denzel Washington and Chris Pine) to stop the train in time.(n)

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: Two strangers are united by necessity and circumstances after their plane crashes, leaving the two stranded on a snowy mountain. As they struggle to deal with the harsh elements and their growing despair, they find strength in each other to make a difficult journey in search of rescue.(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Set around the world of oil and drilling in the depths of the seas, where one of the American oil platforms exploded in 2010; which resulted in the largest oil spill in the history of the United States.(n)

Dr. Adrian Helmsley is an American geologist who, while on a trip to India, learns that there has been increased solar activity. Dr. Helmsley also discovers that this will lead to a rise in the temperature of Earth’s core – a phenomenon which will have dire consequences for humanity. 2012 is said to be the end date of the Mayan calendar, which many believe marks the end of the world.(n)

programme.desc: When he is whisked away from his dull London orphanage, life, the twelve-year-old Peter finds himself in the magical Neverland, where fun is just another word for danger and vice versa. Many adventures send Peter exploring more about himself and his world, eventually becoming an immortal hero.(n)

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a remote town near the edge of the magical land, Tristan promises his beloved that he will search for a fallen star for her, embarking on a journey of magical adventures in the process.(n)

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A runaway train carrying toxic chemicals must be stopped before it derails and kills everyone in town. Its up to a train conductor and engineer (Denzel Washington and Chris Pine) to stop the train in time.(n)

programme.desc: Set around the world of oil and drilling in the depths of the seas, where one of the American oil platforms exploded in 2010; which resulted in the largest oil spill in the history of the United States.(n)

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A mother is forced to move with her son, from the United States to live in China. He's embraced by a Kung Fu master who teaches him all the secrets of the game and changes his life, and the life of his mother for the better.(n)

programme.title: The Lego Batman Movie
programme.desc: LEGO Batman stars in his own big-screen adventure in which he goes on a personal journey to overcome his old fear of having a family through sharing his thrilling experience with ah a boy he had adopted. While trying to save Gotham city from the Joker's hostile takeover, he discovers the need to learn the value of fun-spirited teamwork.(n)

programme.title: Power Rangers
programme.desc: A group of high-school kids with exceptional and unique superpowers, harness their abilities in order to save the world.(n)

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: On the run in the year of 1987, Bumblebee finds refuge in a junkyard in a small Californian beach town and is found by Charlie, an 18 year old girl who is trying to find her place in the world. When Charlie revives him, she discovers that this is no ordinary, yellow VW bug.(n)

programme.title: RoboCop
programme.desc: In 2028 Detroit, the multinational OmniCorp is at the center of robot and weapon technology. When Alex Murphy, a loving father and a good cop is seriously injured, OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer. But Alex's life begins to change and turns upside down.(n)

programme.title: Deepwater Horizon
programme.desc: Set around the world of oil and drilling in the depths of the seas, where one of the American oil platforms exploded in 2010; which resulted in the largest oil spill in the history of the United States.(n)

programme.desc: Two strangers are united by necessity and circumstances after their plane crashes, leaving the two stranded on a snowy mountain. programme.title: Paddington 2
programme.desc: Paddington is happily living with the Brown family in Windsor Gardens, where he becomes a popular member of the community. He finds a special book to give to his Aunt Lucy for her 100th birthday at Mr. Gruber's antique shop, and gets involved in a series of peculiar jobs to buy it.

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: The film follows a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until a chance encounter with an acquaintance from Simon's high school sends their world into a harrowing tailspin.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale
programme.desc: The film revolves around a friendship between a young child and "Telly" a dolphin that loses his tail in a crab trap. He got rescued and transferred to a Navy hospital in Pklerooter. There the child helps him to get back to water even without his tail.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale 2
programme.desc: After Sawyer Nelson and the team at the Clearwater Marine Hospital manage to save the dolphin Winter, they're faced with a new challenge when Winter's surrogate mother passes away, and they must find Winter a companion before she's taken away to another aquarium.

programme.title: First Man
programme.desc: A look at the life of Neil Armstrong, the legendary astronaut who was the the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Major William Cage finds himself thrown into a time loop-forcing him to fight aliens in the same brutal battle over and over, and together with Special Forces warrior Rita Vrataski they must find a way to defeat them.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: In a dystopian post-apocalyptic future in the nation of Panem, Katniss Everdeen (Lawrence) volunteers to take her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, where boys and girls between the ages of 12 and 18 are required to fight to death in a televised annual event until there is one remaining who will be crowned the victor.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: The repressed Panem is on the verge of rebellion as 74th Hunger Game victors Katniss and Peeta visit the districts on their victory tour. The two have become symbols of defiance against the Capitol, and for that they will be targeted by the despotic President Snow and his regime.

programme.title: J. Edgar
programme.desc: A biopic that centers on the life of the infamous FBI director J. Edgar Hoover, covering the lines he crossed in the name of protecting the US, his efforts to build the power and reputation of the FBI, and the hidden secrets he kept in fear of discrimination and scandal.(c)

programme.title: Child 44
programme.desc: In 1950s Soviet Russia, secret police agent Leo Demidov is exiled with his wife to a remote province where they join forces with Gen. Mikhail Nesterov to investigate the case of a serial killer who kills young boys, and in their quest reveals horrific secrets related to the political system itself.(c)

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: The film follows a family whose suburban home is invaded by angry spirits. When the terrifying apparitions escalate their attacks and take the youngest daughter, the family must come together to rescue her.(n)

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: Carrie (Chloë Grace Moretz) is your typical high school bully shy, insecure, and pushed around by her classmates and her rigidly religious mother alike. She discovers she has telekinetic powers, which she unleashes on her town when she's humiliated at her school prom.(n)

programme.title: The DUFF
programme.desc: Bianca is a content high school senior whose world is shattered as she learns the student body knows her as 'The DUFF'. Despite the words of caution from her favorite teacher, she puts aside the potential distraction of her crush, Toby, and enlists Wesley, a charming jock, to help reinvent herself.(n)

programme.title: Mortal Engines
programme.desc: After the 60-minute war, the survived cities thrive to stay on the now unfertile Earth. The strong survivors then decide to go to the smaller ones using huge bikes to take their resources.(n)

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
programme.desc: The repressed Panem is on the verge of rebellion as 74th Hunger Game victors Katniss and Peeta visit the districts on their victory tour. The two have become symbols of defiance against the Capitol, and for that they will be targeted by the despotic President Snow and his regime.(n)

programme.title: The English Teacher
programme.desc: An isolated lonely English teacher's life is turned upside down when her ex-student Jason Sherwood returns after failing to become a playwright. She convinces him to produce his own play on her school's theater, while his overbearing father is pressuring him to join law school instead.(n)

programme.title: J. Edgar
programme.desc: A biopic that centers on the life of the infamous FBI director J. Edgar Hoover, covering the lines he crossed in the name of protecting the US, his efforts to build the power and reputation of the FBI, and the hidden secrets he kept in fear of discrimination and scandal.(n)

programme.title: Next
programme.desc: A clairvoyant magician is pursued by a counter-terrorism agent who wants him to use his ability to prevent a nuclear disaster. As his gift limits him to only seeing two minutes into the future, Cris is forced to flee with both the FBI and the terrorist close on his tail.(n)

programme.title: Ninja Assassin
programme.desc: When his lover Kiriko is murdered, the young ninja Raizo turns his back on the orphanage that raised him and exacts his vengeance on those who killed her.(n)

programme.title: Security
programme.desc: A security guard protects a woman from a ruthless gang that wants to kill her because she wants to testify against them.(n)

programme.title: The Tourist
programme.desc: An unwitting American tourist named Frank finds himself in the midst of an intense pursuit that involves various European police forces and a gang of Belarusians among other parties. A seemingly minor error causes Frank to be mistaken for a man wanted by law authorities and mafia men alike.(n)

programme.title: One for the Money
programme.desc: Stephanie Plum (Katherine Heigl) loses her job, and works with her cousin Finney as a bounty hunter . Her first case is to find officer Joe Morelli (Jason O'Mara), who's accused of murder but she faces obstacles because of his skills . During her search, she believes that he's innocent and tries to prove it.(n)

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: In a force of undead police officers, the Rest in Peace Department, a young slain cop (Ryan Reynolds) teams up with veteran sheriff (Jeff Bridges) to protect the living from roving, monstrous spirits who have not yet crossed over.

programme.title: Baahubali: The Beginning
programme.desc: After growing up isolated from the world, Shivudu's adventurous nature leads him out of his homeland. His journey leads him to discover his true origins and the bloody dispute that led to him being raised away from his rightful royal place.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is heading towards Earth, threatening to destroy mankind, NASA sends a team of drillers and geologists, to drill inside the asteroid and blow it from the inside with a warhead.

programme.title: Source Code
programme.desc: A soldier wakes up in the body of an unknown man; he discovers that he is part of a mission to find the bomber of a Chicago commuter train.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: The L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team (S.W.A.T.) is charged with securing and escorting criminal Alex Montell, who is a foreign mafia leader wanted by the Interpol. Alex is offering a $ 100 million reward for anyone who can break him out of police custody.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a last ditch effort to stop Memnon from taking over the world, the leaders of the remaining free tribes hire the assassin Mathayus to kill Cassandra, whom Menmon depends on to foretell his great victoies.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy 2
programme.desc: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 continues the team's adventures as they traverse the outer reaches of the cosmos. The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mysteries of Peter Quill's true parentage. Old foes become new allies and favorite characters from the classic comics will come to the Guardians' aid as the Marvel cinematic universe continues to expand.

programme.title: Man of Tai Chi
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves’ directorial debut centers on the spiritual journey of a talented young martial artist whose skills draw him into the world of underground fight clubs.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: The beautiful Snow White gets into a fierce conflict with the Evil Queen. The Huntsman tries to train her to withstand these evil forces, but is it enough for her to defeat them.

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: A professional driver who works in criminal operations, is charged with transporting the daughter of a dangerous Chinese crime lord.(c)

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Frankenstein's monster becomes involved in an ancient war between two immortal clans of demons and gargoyles.(c)

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Brian O'Conner teams up with his ex-con friend Roman Pearce and undercover U.S. Customs Service agent Monica Fuentes to bring down Miami's drug lord Carter Verone.(c)

programme.title: 88 Minutes
programme.desc: Dr. Jack Gramm is a forensic psychologist whose testimony helps convict serial killer Jon Forster. As Forster's execution date looms closer, Gramm receives a call informing him that he only has 88 minutes to live.(c)

programme.title: Reign of Fire
programme.desc: After a hibernating dragon is awakened from the earth burning everything, the remaining survivors live in a refortified castle where the fire chief, Quinn, tries to protect them from the menacing beasts. Until an American called Van Zan arrives, claiming to have found a way to kill the dragon.(c)

programme.title: الفيلم الوثائقي Marvel's Behind The Mask
Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
programme.desc: As the Imperial fleet launches an attack on the Rebel Alliance base in Hoth, the spirit of Obi-Wan Kenobi sends Luke Skywalker to train under Yoda.(c)

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: An evil dwarf penetrates the world between humans and mythical creatures, who declare war against the human race. A secret mission is planned to release the Golden Army, that is made up of a great number of strange and vicious creatures. Hellboy and his team are summoned to stop them and save humanity.(c)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
programme.desc: As the rebels rescue Han Solo and set out to destroy the second Death Star, Luke Skywalker tries to find a way to bring his father back from the dark side.(c)

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Frankenstein's monster becomes involved in an ancient war between two immortal clans of demons and gargoyles.(c)

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: In the Hawaiian Islands, an international naval engage an intense battle against an alien species known as "The Regents". The aliens come to planet Earth to build a power source in the ocean.(c)

programme.title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
programme.desc: Scott Lang (Paul Rudd) faces the consequences of his choices as a superhero and a father; as he struggles to re-balance his domestic life while assuming his responsibilities as Ant-Man. He’s also confronted by Hope van Dyne (Evangeline Lilly) and Dr. Hank Pym (Michael Douglas) with an urgent new mission.(c)

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: After his career becomes at stake, Dr. Strange (Benedict Cumberbatch) an arrogant neurosurgeon, gets a new chance in life, where a great sorcerer trains him in order to protect the world from evil.(c)

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: Upon discovering his baby photo on a website for missing persons, Nathan discovers that the father and mother he has been living with throughout his youth are not his real parents. He sets out to uncover the truth about his life.(c)

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: Frank Martin is a former Special Forces operative who transfers goods for money. His latest job is to chauffer a politician's young son to and from school. When young Jack is kidnapped, Frank races to save the boy and foil the kidnapper's plot to release a deadly virus.(c)

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: Two cops partner up in order to uncover how a group of bank robbers managed to escape from a bank during a heist that apparently has other motives than just stealing money.(c)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: American teenager Sean likes to participate in illegal car races. When he wrecks his rival's car and a race ends in disaster, he's sent to his father in Tokyo to avoid a prison sentence, and there, he discovers the underworld of street racing.(c)

programme.title: Joshua Tree
programme.desc: As Wellman Santee manages to break out of prison, trouble begins when he, unbeknownst to him, kidnaps a female police officer on his way to take revenge on the corrupt cop who put him under lock and key.(c)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Based on real life events in 1996, about a group of mountain climbers who have decided to challenge the hardest climate conditions on the globe and climb Everest. The climbing trip turned to be a deadly adventure due to a storm, which changed everything.(c)

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: After his career becomes at stake, Dr. Strange (Benedict Cumberbatch) an arrogant neurosurgeon, gets a new chance in life, where a great sorcerer trains him in order to protect the world from evil.(c)

programme.title: Black Panther
programme.desc: After T’Challa returns to his home in Wakanda to find himself king, he has to team up with CIA agent Everett K. Ross and members of the Wakandan special forces as “Black Panther” to prevent Wakanda from going into a war.(c)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Jedi Knights Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi escape an aggressive attack during their quest for allies, and on their journey they come across the young boy, Anakin Skywalker, in whom they see a great talent that can restore balance to the Force.(c)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
programme.desc: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padmé Amidala despite the age gap. The Republic is mired in chaos and it is discovered that there is a secret clone army posing a threat to the galaxy.(c)

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: Upon discovering his baby photo on a website for missing persons, Nathan discovers that the father and mother he has been living with throughout his youth are not his real parents. He sets out to uncover the truth about his life.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: Dangerous criminal Richard B. Riddick (Diesel) is being transported to prison in a cargo spacecraft. When the spaceship is damaged by comet debris and makes an emergency crash landing on an empty desert planet, Riddick escapes. However, when predatory alien creatures begin attacking the survivors, Riddick joins forces with the crew to develop a plan to escape the planet.(n)

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: This action epic brings to life the real tale of 47 samurai warriors who in 18th century Japan set out on a quest to avenge the death of their master, killed by a treacherous overlord who banished them from their homeland.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: The film revolves around the history and politics of the reign of King Arthur, during the collapse of the Roman Empire, the outbreak of skirmishes over power in countries far from the empire, and the role of the Knights of the Round Table.(n)

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: After twelve arduous labours and the loss of his family, Hercules found solace in bloody battle. Over the years he warmed to the company of six similar souls, as the King of Thrace hires them to train his men to become the greatest army of all time.(n)

programme.title: Wild Card
programme.desc: Nick Wild is a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal professional skills and a personal gambling problem. When a friend is beaten by a sadistic thug, Nick strikes back, only to find out the thug is the son of a powerful mob boss, dragging Nick into the criminal underworld.(n)

programme.title: Game Night
programme.desc: During a regularly-held game night between friends, the murder mystery they are trying to solve turns all too real when the brother of one of the players is kidnapped in front of their eyes, drawing all of them into a real-life crime investigation.

programme.title: برنامج Hollywood One On One Hollywood Buzz
Oranges and Sunshine
programme.desc: The true story of social worker Margaret Humphreys from Nottingham, who uncovers the scandal of the forcible migration of thousands of orphaned children from the UK to Australia, as she tries to reunite the estranged families and hold the government accountable.

programme.title: The Choice
programme.desc: Irfan is an idealistic professor who gets out of a job and he is in a dilemma as the doors close one by one in his face and he has to find a way to look after his sick son, even if this means getting into an inescapable dark adventure.

programme.desc: A step-father finds himself threatened by fierce competition when his step-children's father, who is way more cool than him, shows up suddenly.(n)

programme.desc: The extraordinary stories of three different strangers who only share one thing: they live within the same hundred London streets. Is there any chance for them to cross paths.(n)

programme.desc: Plastic surgeon Danny Maccabee fakes being married in order to enjoy future dates. He fabricates a web of lies with his assistant as she poses as his soon-to-be-ex-wife, but that apparently gets him into more trouble and pushes away his crush.(n)

programme.title: Sweet Land
programme.desc: Set in a 1920 small Minnesota village; as a German woman arrives for an arranged marriage to a Norwegian immigrant farmer, the young couple has to deal with the rising hostility towards Germans in the aftermath of WWI.

programme.title: Father of the Bride
programme.desc: George (Steve Martin) and Nina (Diane Keaton) are the parents of the soon-to-be-wed daughter Annie (Kimberly Williams-Paisley). George isn't yet able to accept the idea that he will let his daughter go, while a series of comic events take place during the preparation for the wedding.

programme.title: Father of the Bride Part II
programme.desc: As George struggles to accept his daughter's impending motherhood and what it says about his own role in her life, a rather unexpected dilemma further complicates his life when he discovers that his own wife is pregnant.

programme.title: Rust Creek
programme.desc: On her way for a job interview, a college student takes a wrong turn and is stranded in the forest where she has to battle cruel forces and ruthless outlaws before she strikes a deal with a stranger to secure a way out of the woods.

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: Truman, an employee of the insurance company, lives a normal life, in which the same situations are repeated on a daily basis. Despite his quiet life with his beautiful wife, Truman always feels something is missing. Truman wants to travel and roam the world, but obstacles always stand in his way. Truman is one of America's most famous people, but he certainly does not know it.

programme.title: Sweet Land
programme.desc: Set in a 1920 small Minnesota village; as a German woman arrives for an arranged marriage to a Norwegian immigrant farmer, the young couple has to deal with the rising hostility towards Germans in the aftermath of WWI.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: The life of an unemployed family living in a poor apartment changes completely when the son becomes the English tutor for the daughter of a wealthy family. As the lives of the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim family intersect, what follows is a web of deceit and disturbing violence.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: Ferris pretends to be sick so he doesn't go to school, and he persuades his girlfriend Sloane and his friend Cameron to go to Chicago to spend time there to help him heal. The triple go with the car of Cameron's father, and events take a comic turn.

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: Napoleon Dynamite is a socially awkward teenager who lives with his grandma and unemployed older brother in Preston, Idaho. He sets out to help his friend, Pedro, win the class presidency while dealing with his insane family at home.

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: Bliss Cavendar is a misfit teenager from Texas who struggles with her mother who wants her to win beauty pageants. But when Bliss comes across members of a roller derby team, she discovers her true passion as she joins them in a women's roller derby championship.

programme.title: The Beach
programme.desc: Richard is an American college student who goes to Thailand on vacation. He meets Daffy who tells him about a secret paradise island that you need a map to get to. Richard gets the map, and meets a French couple, who he convinces to join him on his quest. They make their way to Bangkok and finally reach the island, which holds a surprise for them.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: Don Vito Corleone,the head of one of the five mafia families in New York, doesn't want his younger son Michael to get involved in the life of organized crime. Michael feels the same, but things change when negotiations fail between the family of Don Corleone and other families about the distribution of drugs.

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: With their childhood home put up for sale, sisters Maura and Kate reunite for one last hurrah at the place that witnessed their glory days. Deciding to throw a party for their old high school friends, things quickly spin out of control as old rivalries and new conflicts rise to the surface.

programme.title: Moulin Rouge!
programme.desc: As a young writer seeking his fortune in the aftermath of the Bohemian revolution tries to get his play picked up by the owner of the Moulin Rouge, he finds himself involved in a dangerous love affair with star courtesan Satin who is coveted by the wealthy Duke of Monroth.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: Ferris pretends to be sick so he doesn't go to school, and he persuades his girlfriend Sloane and his friend Cameron to go to Chicago to spend time there to help him heal. The triple go with the car of Cameron's father, and events take a comic turn.

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: Napoleon Dynamite is a socially awkward teenager who lives with his grandma and unemployed older brother in Preston, Idaho. He sets out to help his friend, Pedro, win the class presidency while dealing with his insane family at home.

programme.title: Whip It
programme.desc: Bliss Cavendar is a misfit teenager from Texas who struggles with her mother who wants her to win beauty pageants. But when Bliss comes across members of a roller derby team, she discovers her true passion as she joins them in a women's roller derby championship.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: When her family is threatened by Vladimir Lenin, Anastasia Romanova escapes through a magic portal that takes her to the year 1988, where she becomes friends with an American girl.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: The film revolves around the arrival of seven armed men, from the Old West to a remote village, in order to help its people, in their fight against an evil gang trying take advantage of the village and the people.(n)

programme.title: Groundhog Day
programme.desc: Sent for a loathed assignment in the town of Punxsutawney, a self-centered weatherman finds himself stuck in a time loop as he relives the town's annual Groundhog Day festivities over and over again.(n)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: The film follows the love lives of two childhood friends who become Air Force Pilots, and are split when one volunteers to fight in Britain, and the other, along with his friend's lover, is transferred to Pearl Harbor, shortly before the Japanese attack on the place.(n)

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business
programme.desc: Calvin's adventures continue with his barber shop. Real estate developers want to buy the property in the area. He faces new competition from the beauty shop across the street , while a new barber shop called Nappy Cutz opens. Calvin tries to change the style and decorations of his own shop so that he can compete with them.(n)

programme.title: سباى هارد
Spy Hard
programme.desc: General Rancor plans to destroy the world with his missile hidden in a secret base, he kidnaps the scientist Prof. Ukrinsky who has a special computer chip that would complete his goal. Special Agent Dick Steele along with Ukrinsky's daughter are assigned to stop him and save the world.(n)

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: After he survives an assassination attempt in Sweden, the contract killer Jack flees to Rome where he is hired to build a custom sniper rifle for a client, as he vows that this will be his last job.(n)

programme.title: Shutter Island
programme.desc: U.S. Marshall Teddy Daniels investigates the disappearance of a convicted murderer from a hospital for the criminally insane that is located on isolated Shutter Island.(n)

programme.title: Blades of Glory
programme.desc: In 2002, Olympic ice skaters, Chazz and Jimmy were stripped of their gold medals and banned from the competition, but they find a loophole in the rules that would allow them to qualify as pairs team and participate together in an attempt to overcome their rivalry.(n)

programme.title: A Dog's Breakfast
programme.desc: Patrick is a single man who lives with his dog Mars. When his sister visits to introduce him to her TV star fiancé, things spiral out of control when Patrick thinks that he might've killed him by mistake.(n)

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: As the high school student Scott Howard struggles to fit in, his life takes a surprising turn when he finds out that he's a werewolf. But as he starts to become popular at school, he has to deal with his unusual nature.(n)

programme.title: Larry Crowne
programme.desc: Middle-aged Larry Crown loses his job, and decides that he wants to start over and go back to college. He meets Mercedes, his professor, who leads a disappointing life with her husband. Fate brings them together, and Larry finally begins to fall in love with life again.(n)

programme.title: The Flood
programme.desc: An immigration officer finds herself in a tight spot as the fate of an asylum seeker lies in her hand, while flashbacks of his journey out of his homeland are portrayed.(n)

programme.title: When Harry Met Sally
programme.desc: The events begin during the trip to New York with Harry and Sally. Harry planned to start working in a wide-ranging institution. Meanwhile, Sally had planned to attend journalism, and their relationship would start through a dispute over their accidental meeting, and their relationship would evolve over time.(n)

programme.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
programme.desc: Peter goes to Hawaii on vacation to try to forget his girlfriend the TV star Sarah, who ended their relationship a short time ago, only to find her staying in the same resort with her new boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: Get Him to the Greek
programme.desc: British rock star Aldous Snow lives in a whirlwind of alcohol and drugs. When Aaron interns at a record company, his manager assigns him to get Aldous from London to Los Angeles for a concert. When he reaches London and Aldous, he finds himself in chaos and unable to get him to the concert, while Aldous postpones their trip numerous times.(n)

programme.desc: As Ally competes on a dating show, she returns to her hometown of Winterland, where she has to face her high school sweetheart, while dealing with the charming bachelor from the show.

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: When he learns that his old sweetheart, Lillian, has been diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease and taken to a senior center, the ageing, lovesick widower Claude hatches a plan to be reunited with her.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
programme.desc: The true story of Fred Rogers, the presenter of 'Mister Rogers Neighborhood' program, which is one of the most popular children's programs, and his friendship with journalist Lloyd Vogel who was sent to do a story about him.

programme.title: The Boy Inside: Trapped By Tourettes
Adventures of a Mathematician
programme.desc: Based on a true story; in the 1930s, Stan Ulam, a Polish-born mathematician, travels to the United States, where he joins the Manhattan Project and helps create the first computer.

programme.title: Love Struck Café
programme.desc: When she returns to her hometown for a business opportunity that involves a complicated confrontation with a childhood friend, Megan gets more than she reckoned for when her father breaks his leg and she starts helping at his cafe. Then an old flame shows up and everything spins out of control.

programme.title: The High Note
programme.desc: A famous singer and her hardworking assistant try to make a difficult choice, which could change the course of their careers forever.

programme.title: 2 Hearts
programme.desc: The story of two couples from different times whose lives are intertwined by a special connection that will forever change their fates.

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: When a depressed Spencer starts fiddling with the broken Jumanji game in search of purpose, his friends reenter the game to rescue him, along with his grandfather and his old friend. As they encounter a landscape ravaged by drought, they must fight to find Spencer and save Jumanji.

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.

programme.title: Synchronic
programme.desc: The story follows two New Orleans paramedics whose lives spiral out of control after a designer drug with strange effects causes a series of horrific deaths.(c)

programme.title: Freaky
programme.desc: A high school girl races against time, when she magically swaps bodies with a notorious serial killer, as she finds out that she only has 24 hours before she becomes stuck in his body for good.(n)

programme.title: The Grudge
programme.desc: After a mother kills her family in her house, and a single mother and a detective try to solve the case, only to discover that the house is cursed by a vengeful ghost that leads anyone who enters it into a violent death.(n)

programme.title: Deadwood: The Movie
programme.desc: As the townspeople gather to celebrate South Dakota's statehood, a clash over land leaves Charlie Utter dead and US Marshall Seth Bullock tries to solve the murder and protect the townspeople from Senator George Hearst.(n)

programme.title: Love in the Forecast
programme.desc: The life of the weather girl Leah Waddell takes a surprising turn after she decides to make a one year to focus on her career and stop dating. But she finds herself chased by men who want to date her.(n)

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: The adventures of Han Solo and Chewbacca before joining the Rebellion and their encounters with the famous gambler Lando Calrissian, in a journey that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga's most unlikely heroes.(n)

programme.title: Born a Champion
programme.desc: Black-belt BJJ fighter Mickey Kelley loses in an MMA match against Marco Blaine. Years later, it is revealed that the latter cheated, upon which Kelley finally gets a rematch.(n)

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: When a late-night talk-show host is in danger of losing her job, she hires a new woman writer, Molly, to join her only-male writing team. Molly's determination to prove her talent in a male-dominant environment has unexpected results on both Katherine's career and personal life.(n)

programme.title: Winter's Dream
programme.desc: Years after she quit skiing competitively, Kat is asked by a young competitive racer to coach her and hone her skills. Little does she know that the professional opportunity will also bring her love in the form of the racer's widowed father, Ty.(n)

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: When he learns that his old sweetheart, Lillian, has been diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease and taken to a senior center, the ageing, lovesick widower Claude hatches a plan to be reunited with her.(n)

programme.title: After The Wedding
programme.desc: Isabel runs an orphanage in the Indian city of Kolkata, but she desperately needs money to keep the shelter in place, she travels to New York City to meet a benefactor who might help her with funding.(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood

programme.title: The High Note
programme.desc: A famous singer and her hardworking assistant try to make a difficult choice, which could change the course of their careers forever.(n)

programme.title: The Comeback Trail
programme.desc: Two cash-strapped movie producers who owe money to the mob draw a scheme to bring back an aging movie star for an insurance scam in order to use his insurance policy to pay off their own debts, but they get more than they bargained for.(n)

programme.title: Sicario: Day of the Soldado
programme.desc: Sequel to the 2015 film (Sicario), where the drug war on the US-Mexico border has escalated as the cartels have begun trafficking terrorists across the US border.(n)

programme.title: Captive State
programme.desc: With Chicago falling under alien rule for a decade, the human residents chafe at the impoverished neighborhoods they have to live in as an underground resistance group plots to attack.(n)

programme.title: Seized
programme.desc: When his son gets kidnapped by a mysterious entity, former special forces agent Niro finds himself embroiled in a dangerous situation, as he must take out three dangerous crime syndicates in order to get his son back.(n)

programme.title: Love Locks
programme.desc: In the City of Light, Lindsey fell in love with Jack while studying at the Sorbonne, a romance that quickly ended when she went back to the US. Twenty years later, Lindsey returns to Paris with her daughter, only to run into Jack who quickly catches feelings for her all over again.(n)

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: When a spacecraft lands in New York City with a human-like alien named Klaatu on board, the army considers him a threat, but scientist Helen Benson finds out that he's here to save mankind.(n)

programme.title: Rome in Love
programme.desc: With her dreams of being an actress about to come true, Amelia needs to keep the news of her casting as the lead in the remake of Roman Holiday under wraps. But once she meets a journalist tasked with writing about the mysterious new lead of the movie, all bets are off as romance comes knocking.(n)

programme.title: All My Life
programme.desc: When Solomon meets Jennifer sparks fly and they fall head over heels in love. As they decide to get married, their wedding plans are disrupted when they find out that Solomon has liver cancer.(n)

programme.title: Never Too Late
programme.desc: Trapped in a retirement home, a group of former veterans seeks to put their skills to use to break out of their unwanted place of retirement, hoping to achieve the unrealized dreams that each of them still has.(n)

programme.title: Irresistible
programme.desc: A small Wisconsin town becomes the center of political attention, when a Democrat strategist named Gary tries to help a retired Marine Colonel run for mayor.(n)

programme.title: Love, of Course
programme.desc: While helping her daughter move into her new dorm, Amy starts her own new chapter of life when she lands a job on campus. One charismatic professor later, Amy finds a new purpose and a fresh start that she never saw coming.(n)

programme.title: Archive
programme.desc: After the tragic death of his wife, the scientist George Almore lives in an isolated facility as he tries to perfect a prototype of a true human-equivalent AI. But he keeps his real motive hidden, which is to bring his dead wife back to life.(n)

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: Now a police inspector, Marcus Burnett teams up with Mike Lowery as they face off against a pair of drug lords, who are, in fact, a mother and a son, all while previous vendettas are chasing them.(n)

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: When he learns that his old sweetheart, Lillian, has been diagnosed with Alzheimer’s disease and taken to a senior center, the ageing, lovesick widower Claude hatches a plan to be reunited with her.(n)

programme.title: Mighty Oak
programme.desc: Years after her brother dies, Gina runs across the music prodigy Oak Scoggins. While anyone would only be taken by Oak's talent, Gina sets her eyes on reuniting her old band as she becomes convinced that Oak is actually the reincarnation of her late brother.(n)

programme.title: How to Build a Girl
programme.desc: As she tries to find a way to help her impoverished family, the teenage Johanna Morrigan takes on the persona of a worldly music critic named Dolly Wilde.(n)

programme.title: Green Book
programme.desc: In 1962, Tony "Tony Lip” (Viggo Mortensen), an Italian-American tough bouncer, is hired to be the driver for the African-American classical pianist Dr. Don Shirley (Mahershala Ali) for a concert tour into the Deep South states. Because of America's racial segregation, Shirley relies on The Negro Motorist Green Book to guide them to small hotels, restaurants and gas stations. As the disparate pair witness and endure America's appalling injustices on the road, they find a newfound respect for each that opens their eyes to the world around them.(n)

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: After a confrontation on the road, a single mother and her son find themselves stalked by a deranged man who's hellbent on teaching them fatal lessons.(n)

programme.title: Emma.
programme.desc: Emma Woodhouse is a young, wealthy woman who seeks a reprieve from her stilted small-town life by playing matchmaker for her friends and relatives, an endeavor that sees her meddling in the lives of those closest to her, often without being asked to.(n)

programme.title: Killer Competition
programme.desc: High school senior Nicole fudges test grades in order to become valedictorian. But things take a horrifying turn, as some students get murdered, and she becomes the main suspect.(n)

programme.desc: A look into the Baltimore drug scene from both sides, the drug dealers and the law enforcement team tasked with bringing them down, through the story of a detective who leads a joint homicide and narcotics team in the pursuit of drug lord Avon Barksdale.

programme.desc: Things grow tense after a fight between Eve and Villanelle, which leaves the latter in a critical condition. As Eve is drawn back into the investigation into the Twelve, Villanelle has to figure out a way to survive and get Eve's attention.

programme.title: A Model Kidnapping
programme.desc: When the aspiring model Grace goes to a photoshoot for the fashion photographer Hunter, things take a terrifying turn when she finds herself kidnapped, as she has to find a way to free herself from his clutches.

programme.title: Miss Arizona
programme.desc: A former beauty queen's attempt to find her way out of a lethargic mindset has unforeseen consequences. When she starts teaching life skills lessons at a women's shelter, trouble at the shelter finds her fleeing along with four women who are trying to dodge their abusive exes.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: When a brilliant anthropologist who has been living among the gorillas in Africa is caught after killing some poachers, an up-and-coming psychiatrist tries to uncover the truth of what happened, how the anthropogist disappeared in Africa, and the cause of his violent outbrust.

programme.title: You Again
programme.desc: Marni is a successful businesswoman who returns to her hometown for the marriage of her older brother. She finds that he's about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school. Things get worse when Marni's mother comes face-to-face with the girl's aunt, who was also bothering her in high school.

programme.title: Beneath the Leaves
programme.desc: After going to jail for kidnapping four boys, the deranged psychopath James Whitley escapes from prison to resume his evil path. Two detectives set out to stop him before he destroys anymore lives.

programme.title: Miss Arizona
programme.desc: A former beauty queen's attempt to find her way out of a lethargic mindset has unforeseen consequences. When she starts teaching life skills lessons at a women's shelter, trouble at the shelter finds her fleeing along with four women who are trying to dodge their abusive exes.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: When a brilliant anthropologist who has been living among the gorillas in Africa is caught after killing some poachers, an up-and-coming psychiatrist tries to uncover the truth of what happened, how the anthropogist disappeared in Africa, and the cause of his violent outbrust.

programme.title: The Children Act
programme.desc: A renowned High Court Judge deals with a personal crisis just as she has to rule on one of the hardest cases of her life. Her ruling is what determines whether an underage leukemia patient can refuse a life-saving blood transfusion for religious reasons or not.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: The film tells of a suspicious video of some strange scenes, after the viewer sees it, he gets a phone call telling him that he will die after 7 days.

programme.title: Picture Perfect Mysteries: Newlywed and Dead
programme.desc: During a wedding, the groom is mysteriously shot dead. The wedding photographer, Allie, finds herself smack dab in the middle of a murder investigation as she tries to prove the innocence of her brother, who just happens to be the bride's ex.

programme.title: Fantasy Island
programme.desc: After being invited to a resort that is being touted as the place where fantasies can come true, the fantasy turns into a nightmare for a group of strangers when they find themselves trapped on the island, with their memories, demons, and traumas used against them.

programme.title: The Proposal
programme.desc: With her impending deportation looming closer, Margaret strongarms her assistant Andrew into marrying her to secure her stay in the US. But what begins as a business arrangement takes a swerve into romance as Margaret accompanies Andrew to his hometown, and they start to fall for each other.

programme.title: Gia
programme.desc: The true story of the top fashion model, Gia Carangi, who rose to the top of the modeling world from the late 1970s.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: A former gateway driver for a gang is enrolled in Witness Protection. When he gives his guard the slip in order to drive his girlfriend to an interview in LA, their field trip gets more complicated as they are pursued by a former acquaintance and a US Marshall.

programme.title: Lady-Like
programme.desc: Allie is a brilliant college student who has trouble fitting in. When her best friend starts dating, Allie is left aimless as she used her friend as a social crutch, leaving her to navigate her path to adulthood on her own.

programme.title: Grace of Monaco
programme.desc: The biopic of Hollywood starlet Grace Kelly, who married Prince Rainier III of Monaco in April 1956. The film tracks a particularly trying time, during a political dispute in the 1960s between Rainier and French President Charles De Gaulle.

programme.title: Picture Perfect Mysteries: Newlywed and Dead

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.(n)

programme.title: The Other Wife
programme.desc: Kate's life falls apart when she learns that her husband has been leading a double life. Things get even worse when a mysterious killer goes after her for the money her late husband has stolen from him.(n)

programme.title: Dream House Nightmare
programme.desc: What was supposed to be a lucky purchase for a married couple turns into a nightmare when they discover that their dream house is coveted by an unstable woman who is willing to do anything to force them out.(n)

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: Andrea recently graduated, and aspires to work in a fashion magazine, she accepts to work in one of the most famous magazines, but as a second assistant to the editor-in-chief Miranda, and in order to keep her job, Andrea must impress her tough and demanding boss.(n)

programme.title: Hidden Agenda
programme.desc: Following the assassination of an American human rights lawyer in Belfast, his girlfriend sets out on a dangerous mission to expose the truth, which might have alarming consequences.(n)

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: The true story of how down-on-her-luck single mother Erin Brokovish put together one of the biggest class actions suits in US history and won the high profile case against a multi-million dollar company despite her lack of formal education in the law.(n)

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: Karen gives her son, Andy, an AI toy doll branded as "Buddi" for his birthday, which Andy calls "Chucky ". Andy starts to feel something is wrong with it, as it develops a very sinister mind of its own.(n)

programme.title: Mothers' Instinct
programme.desc: The Alice and Celine families live in Brussels in the 1960s, but when Celine's son dies in a tragic accident, Celine blames her neighbor Alice for not helping him, and Alice feels that her neighbor is trying to take revenge on her son Theo.(n)
